Topic.Title: Why did Obama Lie about Bin Laden?

Message.Msg: "Why would the President lie?" ---------------------- JUG EARS himself is a lie, a fraud, simply a front nan puppet of his Chicago communist handlers. "Bissonnette also writes disparagingly that NONE of the SEALs were fans of President Barack Obama" -- More importantly, (and I mean extremely importantly) even though the military is comprised of a large percentage of blacks the officer hierarchy despises JUG EARS. That is IMPORTANT because should a national crisis arise and JUG EARS attempts to seize power (like Hitler did) the American military will stop him in a heartbeat. I worried about the power seizing scenario from before JUG EARS election, the man has a sinister quality to him. On JUG EARS visit to West Point shortly after his election any observer could plainly see the polite coldness the Army officers demonstrated. The polite coldness JUG EARS received relieved any concerns of a unfortuitous rise to absolute power. JUG EARS campaign crowds are only 50% of what they were in 2008, there is a palpable lack of enthusiasm for JUG EARS. Only the most shrill whackjobs (i.e. pee down his leg Chris Matthews) of the news media are enthusiastically beating the drums for his reelection. The average Americans are beginning to see JUG EARS sinister quality, while they may not view it in that exact context, they sense there is something very disturbing about JUG EARS. Thank God and the collective common sense of the American people JUG EARS will live out his life in obscure infamy worse than that of Jimmy Carter. Romney is a 100% buffoon(he trained Meg Whitman), but at least he's a patriot and take it to the bank, Romney won't sellout the USA. Read more: http://www.foxnews.com/us/2012/08/29/navy-seal-book-raises-questions-about-bin-laden-death-report-says/#ixzz25KNFPHkz

Message.Title: Every President Since 1978 Lied About Osama.
Message.Msg: Ever since Jimmy Carter helped arm the Taliban against Russia, to Reagan and Ollie North trading weapons to terrorists to arm the Contras (more terrorists) to the fictions of Bush 1, Bill Clinton and especially Bush Junior, and topping it off with Obama's BS about killing a guy who was probably already dead back in 2000, Osama, our former ally, has been demonized and the blame for an attack he couldn't possibly have done: Sept 11. There is no way a guy in cave on a cell phone could get the entire US defense to stand down and let those attacks happen. There are 1000s of architects, engineers and scientists who demand an actual investigation beyond the BS cover story the US government cooked up, so they could have endlessly profitable invasions everywhere. Since almost no truths about Obama have been said why wouldn't there be lies and serious questions about his so called killing? I'm sure Osama will come out with yey another tape explaining his own death properly when they decide which of his 4 different pictures will hold the most traction with the dumbed down American voters. PS: Why are we paying the Taliban to let our supply convoys through? Why are we now helping Al Q in Syria? Hard questions that seem to never get asked by the soft minded.

Justice as practiced in northern Europe and the USA in nonexistent in Africa, the blacks have no conception of justice, even the American blacks. Pat Buchanan in his book postulates that by 2025 the USA be in the political control of minorities and it will be the exceptional nation the USA had been. Envision an African government here or a government like Mexico, you get the idea. Even the communist ANALMALE ain't going to like it. What Americans did to American blacks was inhuman, but necessary. As a kid in the 1920's our parents took us tt visit Washington DC. Being quite young I remember little except for sleeping on the mall near the Lincoln Memorial. Nobody even gave thought to anything bad happening to us. Today you wouldn't survive 2 minutes before some shine stuck a knife in you. I like Buchanan am convinced the USA is finished, if you've lived long enough in the USA your frame of reference tells you that the USA is going downhill in quickstep. Hopefully I'll be gone before the real bad s#it hits the fan and I am so sad for our grandchildren and great-grandchildren(several who are wild-eyed literals). There's really nothing I can do except vote against the JUG EARED idiots as the come on.
